title: Curse of the Vampire
desc:
Post 1727
- While active, all effects (other than this one) are no longer able to allow players to discard cards. If any try, nothing will happen.
- Instead, any player will be allowed to discard a card for each card they force someone else to draw.
- The Curse of the Vampire is lifted once anyone plays a <:partisan:1107460550268559380> or <:holy:1120560132150022184> card.
